sentences: Parvez Rob (1962/63 â€“ 5 September 2019) was a Bangladeshi composer and music director.
He was the music director of 75 films.
His father Abdur Rob was an MNA in Pakistan period and his cousin Apel Mahmood is a singer and music composer.
Rob was the founding organizing secretary of Bangladesh Cultural Council.
He died on 5 September 2019 at the age of 56 by road accident.
